Title: The Grasshopper
Actors: Lyudmila Tselikovskaya, Sergey Bondarchuk, Vladimir Druzhnikov, Evgeniy Teterin
Plot: Osip Ivanovich Dymov, the titular counselor and the doctor of thirty one years, serves in two hospitals at the same time: intern and anatomist. From nine o'clock in the morning and in the ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.
